channel.title: ServerRemix 2.0
channel.description:
[b]Welcome to the development topic for ServerRemix 2.0
ServerRemix 1.0 is up for download [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,244972.0.html]here.[/url][/b]
[b]When i release ServerRemix it will contain:[/b] [i]-Most skills finished.[/i] [i]-All spells working and ancients.[/i] [i]-Fully working logs.[/i] [i]-Fully working online editor.[/i] [i]-globalobject maker[/i] [i]-command generator[/i] [i]-Autospawn generator[/i] [i]-Character generator[/i]
[b]ServerRemix 2.0 contains atm:[/b] [i]-Almost finished online editor(See the bit under for more info)[/i] [i]-Cooking(only fish). -Global objects -Working genie lamps -Almost finished ::char -Remove object[/i]
[b]The online editor development.[/b] [i]You can see the login page [url=http://cheezex.ulmb.com/webserver/index.php]here[/url] The editing and saving online is DONE! I just need to finish adding all the classes and seeing if i can run a batch file on my host(VERY MUCH DOUT IT). Yes, the editor will be released with the source. no MYSQL needed!
Your able to edit the server online and it will save to the file on your host![/i]
[b]Please post any suggestions and what you would like in ServerRemix 2.0.[/b]

item.title: ServerRemix 2.0
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

[b]Welcome to the development topic for ServerRemix 2.0

ServerRemix 1.0 is up for download here.[/b]

When i release ServerRemix it will contain:
-Most skills finished.
-All spells working and ancients.
-Fully working logs.
-Fully working online editor.
-globalobject maker
-command generator
-Autospawn generator
-Character generator

ServerRemix 2.0 contains atm:
-Almost finished online editor(See the bit under for more info)
-Cooking(only fish).
-Global objects
-Working genie lamps
-Almost finished ::char
-Remove object

The online editor development.
[i]You can see the login page here
The editing and saving online is DONE! I just need to finish adding all the classes and seeing if i can run a batch file on my host(VERY MUCH DOUT IT).
Yes, the editor will be released with the source. no MYSQL needed!

Your able to edit the server online and it will save to the file on your host![/i]

Please post any suggestions and what you would like in ServerRemix 2.0.

Read full topic
